job.title: System Engineer
job.description:
JOB DUTIES:

Part-time Tableau Administrator

Working Hours(15-20 hours per week)


Part-time Tableau Administrator will resolve Tableau Administration ServiceNow tickets including customer interaction as per SLA targets when possible Part-time Tableau Administrator will actively contribute to the ServiceNow Knowledge base and articles regarding incident and service request resolution processes Part-time Tableau Administrator will monitor Tableau Server Health Part-time Tableau Administrator will assist and manage Tableau upgrades (including BitBucket) , back-ups, and restoration Part-time Tableau Administrator will participate in troubleshooting calls with 3rd parties that integrate with Tableau Part-time Tableau Administrator will assist/set-up and manage Tableau extensions, extensions servers, and run extension code (Python, R)
